basics.name: cao quoc khai
basics.label:
I had more than 18 years experience in sales, trade marketing, business development & operations. 12 years in FMCG & 5 years in retail industry in which mostly in setting up & operate distribution system. I used to manage sales team more than 350 headcounts and responsible not only in sales but P&L also. I used to hold position head of sales division more than 350 headcounts with for channel: GT, MT, KA & International Market, Trade Marketing, Sales Capability.
I ued work thru 100% provinces & cities of Vietnam market & travel some country such as: Indonesia, Sigapore, Thailand, Cabodia, Lao & China.
If you find my cv suitable, contact me by my email: caoquockhai@gmail.com or cell phone: 84936436739.

work.desc:
-	Manage GT.
-	To manage delivery team.
-	To develop Horeaca team.
-	To  operate Logistics.
-	To asist CEO.

work.company: Golden Hope Nha Be Edible oils & fats, Vietnam
work.desc:
-	General Trade channel: 63 provinces & cities.
-	Modern Trade channel: Hypermarket, Supermarket & convenience store.
-	Special Account: Horeca, Catering & Corporate.
-	To be responsible not only sales but P&L of B2C.
-	To build up M-plan for year 2015-2017.

-	To re-structure distribution system from traditional to professional selling system.
-	To set up KPOs/ KPIs for new changing.
-	Build up 5 years development plan for Sales Division.
-	Responsible for sales volume, P&L, control expenses/ costs for whole system.
Manage 4 channel:
-      GT.
-      MT.
-      B2B.
-      Sales operations.
-      International Market and cum:
-      Sales capability.
-      Trade marketing.
with more than 350 headcounts in division.

work.company: GR vietnam Holdings limited Representative Office, HCMC, Vietnam
work.desc:
That's convenience store with brand name Circle K, US which operates 24 hours a day & 7 days a week.
It brings the new shoping type to consumer & service as well.

work.company: Cai Lan oils and fats industrial co. ltd
work.desc:
set up, operation and manage distribution system. Manage direct sales team more than 150 staff including: sales team, marketing team, delivery team, truck team (15 truck, drivers), warehouse, admin, HR, customer service, account team... (Consumer pack business).
then i was transferred to business development (industrial end-user) which served for industrial customer: milk, install noodle, confectionery, bakery... manage system in nationwide.

education.institution: Truòng Dai hoc Kinh Tê Thanh Pho Hô Chí Minh
